path.style: color:black; marker-start:url(#id01); marker-end:url(#id02); overflow:visible; fill:none; stroke:black; stroke-width:0.99;
color:black; marker-start:url(#id01); marker-end:url(#id02); overflow:visible; fill:none; stroke:black; stroke-width:0.99;

text.style: font-family:'Comic Sans MS'; font-size:29.2px; font-style:italic; color:black; overflow:visible; fill:black; stroke-width:1px;
font-family:'Comic Sans MS'; font-size:29.2px; font-style:italic; color:black; overflow:visible; fill:black; stroke-width:1px;
font-family:'Comic Sans MS'; font-size:17px; color:black; overflow:visible; fill:#0000ff; stroke-width:1px;
font-family:'Comic Sans MS'; font-size:17.5px; color:black; overflow:visible; fill:#ff0000; stroke-width:1px;
